DOC.brief_summary: This study Pilot Phase II cancer intervention trial low glycemic index diet reduce mammographic density woman high risk breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Low Glycemic Index Diet Breast Density
DOC.criteria: Are 40 60 year age Still menstruate least 10 menstrual cycle previous 12 month Not Taking hormone replacement therapy Stable oral contraceptive use ( change use past 12 month change intend interventional period ) Have previously diagnose breast cancer , DCIS , lobular carcinoma situ , atypical lobular hyperplasia atypical hyperplasia No history breast augmentation reduction surgery Have history malignancy ( exclude nonmelanoma skin cancer ) previous 5 year Have history diabetes metabolic disease require dietary modification Have study baseline mammographic density least 50 % estimate mammographer BIRADS 1 2 mammogram first ever mammogram , otherwise stable mammogram ( change since previous year ) Have follow weight reduction Atkins typs diet past 6 month Not pregnant lactate past 12 month , intend pregnancy study period Successful completion three baseline telephoneadministered 24 hour dietary recall
